# John Zachary Fitch

> Profile README + static portfolio site + SVG dashboard assets.

## Docs
- `README.md`: profile overview and proof links
- `AGENTS.md`: commands and repo boundaries for coding agents

## Data
- `data/projects.toml`: canonical project list used by the dashboard

## Scripts
- `scripts/gen_readme_assets.py`: generates `.github/assets/cards/*.svg`

## Web
- `web/`: static site content (GitHub Pages deploy)
